p: ‘Dead leaf’ was the substrate used most frequently by both species (Small Tree Finch: 43%; Warbler Finch: 36%, Table 1), and they almost exclusively foraged on dead leaves of the endemic S. pedunculata tree (Small Tree Finch: 96%; Warbler Finch: 85%). Small Tree Finches additionally used ‘ Scalesia seed’, ‘herb’, ‘C. auriculatum’ and ‘soil’. Other important substrates for Warbler Finches were ‘leaf’, ‘moss’, ‘twig’, ‘bark’ and ‘ R. niveus’ (Table 1).
